sourcesContent:
EDUCATION
{{ degree.degree }} - {{ degree.field }}
{{ degree.school.name }} - {{ degree.school.location }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { IEducation } from 'src/app/interfaces/education'; import { GetDataService } from 'src/app/services/get-data/get-data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-education', templateUrl: './education.component.html', styleUrls: ['./education.component.scss'], }) export class EducationComponent implements OnInit { education: IEducation[] = []; constructor(private getDataService: GetDataService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.setEducation(this.getDataService.getEducationData()); } setEducation(educationJSON: IEducation[]): void { this.education = educationJSON.map((degree) => { return { degree: degree.degree, field: degree.field, school: { name: degree.school.name, location: degree.school.location, }, graduationYear: degree.graduationYear, }; }); } }
